job.title: Data Scientist / Data Analyst
job.description:
Description:


DataScientist/DataAnalyst Requirements


Location: Anywhere in US but wiling to work Pacific hours.


·3+ years ofdatascience,dataanalytics, or business intelligence experience

·Strong understanding of SQL( Strong - Strong)

·Experience with conductingdataanalysis inPython and / or R

·Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards and presentations(Tableau - Strong )

·Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels

·Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to appropriate and accurate insights

Pluses

·Familiarity with Superset

·Familiarity with running weblab experiments, efficacy studies, or product validation tests

·Familiarity with machine learning basics

·Familiarity with Airbnb infrastructure, including Airflow, Presto SQL, and Hive SQL

·Experience creating and maintainingdatapipelines

·Experience supporting engineering product work
